mapper.sql: mallId, mallNum, mallDes, currentPrice, costPrice, mallType, mallColor, mallBrand, createTime, updateTime, isRecommend, parentPrice, discount
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from mall
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into mall (mallId, mallNum, mallDes, currentPrice, costPrice, mallType, mallColor, mallBrand, createTime, updateTime, isRecommend, parentPrice, discount) values (#{mallId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mallNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mallDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{costPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mallType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mallColor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mallBrand,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isRecommend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE})

insert into mall
mallId,
mallNum,
mallDes,
currentPrice,
costPrice,
mallType,
mallColor,
mallBrand,
createTime,
updateTime,
isRecommend,
parentPrice,

mapper.update:
update mall
mallId = #{record.mallId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mallNum = #{record.mallNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mallDes = #{record.mallDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

parentPrice = #{record.parentPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mallNum = #{mallNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mallDes = #{mallDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where mallId = #{mallId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update mall set mallNum = #{mallNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mallDes = #{mallDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, currentPrice = #{currentPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, costPrice = #{costPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mallType = #{mallType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mallColor = #{mallColor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mallBrand = #{mallBrand,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isRecommend = #{isRecommend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parentPrice = #{parentPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where mallId = #{mallId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM picture p JOIN mall m on p.mallId = m.mallId and p.isFirst = '1'
